_sText:
Map Text File :
You are on an oil rig.

In the middle of the ocean and nearly 40 miles from the nearest landmass
1 of your crew has the virus its now your turn to survive

Features:
2 working cranes
1 working helicopter which circles around the map (thanks to grape-shoot for his fantastic heli)
2 Secret areas - 1 secret area is unescapeable once you have found it (use !ztele to escape it - only if u have become a zombie)

have fun

known bugs:
Texture bug on 1 of the walkways under the rig
light bug on the hidden underwater cave

this is a beta so if u find more problems let me know

email me - jimbo128@live.co.uk
Steam ID - crimson128

End of Text file.

This map design is based on an oil rig

The cranes can be moved and the helicopter can be destroyed using the code panel inside the main room in the rig
